first_translate: it’s lord arendt clovis...!

hangle: 하필이면 이 녀석을 또 맞닥뜨리게 될 줄이야!
first_translate: I can’t believe that we ran into him again!
celine?
do you look upset about something?

hangle: 나 어디로 끌려가서 심문받는 거 아냐?!
first_translate: did he drag me away for questioning or what?!

hangle: 이렇게 되면 내가 먼저 아렌트를 제거해야…
first_translate: at this rate, I’ll have no choice but to get rid of arendt first...
well then...

hangle: 이전의 제 제안은 잊어버리시는 게 좋겠네요.
first_translate: I suppose my previous offer is off the table now.

hangle: 어떤 것이든 헤일론 가주 자리보다 나은 게 떠오르지는 않는지라.
first_translate: that was because nothing seemed better than becoming head of house haylon at the time.
huh? she gave up more easily than expected.

hangle: 좀 더 날 캐 볼 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought she’d try harder to persuade me.

hangle: 원작과 달리 내게 헤일론 가문이란 뒷배가 있는 터라,
first_translate: she must not want to force herself onto me since I’m from house haylon unlike how things went down in the novel.
this works out well for me too.
but still,
isn’t his grace concerned by duke ernest’s proposal?
isn’t his grace concerned by duke ernest’s proposal?
no matter how much I think about it, there's nothing I can do anyway.
you’re quite bold.
haha

hangle: 사실 특기 분야라 걱정을 안 하는 것 뿐이지만.
first_translate: to tell you the truth, I just don’t worry about such matters because they fall under my area of expertise.
right...

hangle: 떠나기 전, 한 가지 궁금한 점이 있습니다.
first_translate: before I go, may I ask one thing?

hangle: 그린 가의 치부를 고하는 익명의 문서.
first_translate: the anonymous document exposing the crimes committed by house green.
was that sent by lady olivia?

hangle: 그러고 보니 아렌트가 그 사건을 처리했다고 했지.
first_translate: now that you mention it, aren’t you the one who took care of that incident?
no wonder everything happened so quickly.
yes.
and thanks to your help, it worked out very well.
however,
I couldn’t help but feel like you might’ve been uncomfortable around me...
...since I contributed to bringing down your family.

hangle: 내가 가명을 댄 이유가 그것 때문이라고 생각했나?
first_translate: is that why you used a pseudonym when sending those documents?
not at all.
good.
I didn’t wish to make enemies with house haylon.
then...
may fortune smile upon you.
thank you.
what a relief! looks like I won’t need to assassinate her after all.
let’s return home now--
eek!!
your grace?
I could've sworn you left already.
of course not. my daughter is here.
so you did scheme earlier, right?

hangle: 어니스트 공작이 그런 제안을 하도록 의도했잖냐.
first_translate: you made duke ernest propose to me on purpose.
I see you caught on.
that was the easiest way.

hangle: 그대로 내버려 두었으면 황제 폐하를 닦달해서 귀찮게 굴었을걸요.
first_translate: if I had done nothing, he would’ve nagged his majesty until he got what he wanted.
in turn, if my influence over high society decreases,
my activities will also become restricted.
alright, good job.

hangle: 확실히 내가 사람 보는 눈 하나는 있다니까.
first_translate: as always, I know people pretty darn well.
now then...
try calling me “father.”
are you really not giving up yet?!
no.
or even "dad" is fine.
I said no.
when do you plan on saying it, then?

hangle: 딱히 부를 일 없을 것 같은데요…?
first_translate: I doubt I'll ever call you either of those names...
fine...
hm?
h-huh?!
let’s go back home.

hangle: 대체 왜 이 타이밍에서 기가 죽어버리는 거야?!
first_translate: why does he suddenly seem so dejected?!
okay.

hangle: 언제 한 번 아빠라고 불러줘야 하나?!
first_translate: when am I going to hear you say “daddy”?! huh?!
a few days later
I guess...
...I'm having trouble believing this myself.

hangle: 내가 정말 리비아의 티 파티에 와 있다니.
first_translate: livy invited me to her tea party.

hangle: 만나 뵙게 되어 영광이에요, 피오나 영애!
first_translate: it’s nice meeting you, lady fiona!
nice meeting you as well.

hangle: 조만간 가문에서 작은 티 파티를 열 예정인데,
first_translate: we’re planning to hold a small tea party soon,
so may I invite you to join us?
I heard them say that before,
but I never imagined they'd actually send me an invitation.
enjoy yourself while you’re here.
thanks...

hangle: 리비아는 이유 없이 잘해주는 사람이 아닌데…
first_translate: livy isn’t someone who treats others kindly without reason...
just what is she thinking...?
by the way,
I heard you entered into some sort of bet with duke ernest.
really? lady fiona?
what kind of bet?
well, it wasn’t exactly a bet per se...
rather, let’s just say we came to a little agreement.
apparently, if I win the upcoming hunting competition,

hangle: 어니스트 공작님께서 절 헤일론의 후계자라고 인정하시겠대요.
first_translate: duke ernest will acknowledge me as successor of house haylon.
win the competition...?
isn’t that dangerous?
we’ll cheer you on, lady fiona.
how cool of you to fight for succession rights!
thanks.
oh, lady fiona.
can I ask you something?
I heard there lives a terrifying magician in haylon.
pardon?
I heard that rumor too!

hangle: 웃으면서 마물을 도륙해서 주변이 온통 피바다가 된다고…
first_translate: they say he slaughters demonic beasts with a grin on his face, turning the whole place into a sea of blood...
where did these rumors come from?
the story I heard was different though.
there’s a magician protecting haylon where winter lasts year-round.

hangle: 헤일론의 사람들은 그 마법사를 이렇게 칭송한다고 하더군요.
first_translate: from what I heard, the people of haylon praise him greatly.
they call him...
“the guardian of winter.”
